Reviews.Title: Best Phone!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carlos Alberto Gallardo Migone
Reviews.Content: I was looking forward to see since i ordered, and when i got it!!!! man!!!! i went back in the days whe i got it for first time back in 2004!!!! phone is great and came intact!!!!

Reviews.Title: The Phone Nokia 3120
Reviews.Author: Vien
Reviews.Content: I like this rate, because it good. They are doing good and on time. Only one I don't like the Phone doesn't original look like the one I had before.

Nokia 3120 GSM Triband Color Screen Mobile Phone General Features: Silver and Indigo Blue profile
Smileyworld Downloads Tri-band Compatible: Stay in touch on GSM 900/1800/1900 Networks
